column1: '''''An Evening in Rivendell''''' is the debut album by the [[Tolkien Ensemble]]
column3: [[1997]]. It features songs composed to the lyrics found in [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' and forms the first part of what was to become a complete musical interpretation of all lyrics in the book (a project given approval by both the [[Tolkien Estate]] and [[HarperCollins]]).

column1: The album features cover art by [[Margrethe II of Denmark]].
